title: My friend keeps lagging out when we play together but only when we are in premades.
body:
When ever we play together his internet just completely shuts off at the start of the game and he can't comeback in time to reconnect. He does not have this problem with any other game, and can play solo just fine without lagging out or having his internet shut off. 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Usually when I hear of connections breaking when playing with a group vs. solo it's because they're running things like Discord/Skype/etc. as a part of playing with the group.  Not sure if that's the case.

If his internet is completely cutting out though, it's likely a hardware issue that would be difficult to help troubleshoot without more knowledge on his setup. The best recommendation I could make at the moment is to try to do things like connecting via cable if connecting via wifi, connecting directly to modem if using router, etc.
